subject: Automobile Racing
Athletics and Sports
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: In a bittersweet end to a charmed season, Jeff Gordon's hopes for a fifth Nascar championship are all but done. Teammate and friend Jimmie Johnson is poised to claim the prize heading into Sunday's race.
snippet: In a bittersweet end to a charmed season, Jeff Gordon's hopes for a fifth Nascar championship are all but done. Teammate and friend Jimmie Johnson is poised to claim the prize heading into Sunday's race.
